Rule.NonCompliantComment: The cramfs module is available and can be loaded, increasing the attack surface.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: The module must be disabled by blacklisting it and preventing automatic loading.
Rule.Correction: echo "install cramfs /bin/false" >> /etc/modprobe.d/cramfs.conf; echo "blacklist cramfs" >> /etc/modprobe.d/cramfs.conf; modprobe -r cramfs
